comments: Find all dash-dash and replace with an em dash.
Find all space-dash-space and replace with an en dash.
Find all double spaces and replace with a single space.
Find all space-colon and replace with a colon.
Find all space-question mark and replace with a question mark.
Find all space-exclamatory sign and replace with an exclamatory sign.
Find all space-equals to and replace with an equals to sign.
Find all space-full stop and replace with a full stop.
Replace "xpress" with "QuarkXPress" NOT enabled. Please enable to test
Replace all firstname-space-second name to second name hyphen first name
Replace only first instance of xpress with QuarkXPress
Replace all instances of  xpress with QuarkXPress keeping the search case insensitive
replace all ten digit phone numbers to all zeroes
